# Claude Analysis Notes

This document provides context for AI assistants working with the IronClaw codebase.

## Purpose

This file is reserved for high-level notes about how Claude is used in this project and for analysis that is relevant to the public documentation.

## Note on Auto-Generated Content

Auto-generated personal context, activity logs, or other workspace-specific files should not be committed here. This file should only contain information useful to all contributors working with AI assistants on IronClaw.
